code: import axios from"axios";import{baseURL}from"./constants";export class OrderController{static async getAll(){const respone=await axios.get("".concat(baseURL,"/orders/getAll"));return respone.data;}static async createOrder(orderDTO){const respone=await axios.post("".concat(baseURL,"/orders/createOrder"),orderDTO);return respone.data;}static async updateOrder(orderDTO){const respone=await axios.patch("".concat(baseURL,"/orders/updateOrder"),orderDTO);return respone.data;}static async deleteOrder(orderDTO){const respone=await axios.delete("".concat(baseURL,"/orders/deleteOrder"),{data:orderDTO});return respone.data;}}
